metadata.name: Moving Fractal pattern1 purple
metadata.description: The main content is an html file. Enjoy it in your browser. Dive into the 3D space spun by fractals by turning the mouse wheel or using a pinch of the touch. if you are on a PC, it responds to mouse dragging and wheel spinning. If you are using a smartphone browser, it will respond to swipes and pinches. The fractal type is #1 of a growing series. The fractal color is based on #95EAFF. This content requires a browser that supports webgl2. They are, for example, relatively recent chrome, firefox, safari, etc. The main content, html, is hosted by IPFS.
